Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Staff is always on good mood and friendly. Convenient bakery on the island. Possible coffee to go. Not my favorite coffee but convenient and decent quality of products.

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: I will probably get a beating by the locals with this, so my apologies for upsetting you. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Fresh and full of taste. Very friendly people. Definitely a place I would go every morning

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Most grumpy staff I have experienced in a while. The two men assisting us were very rude and unhelpful. Quality of the food is okay. These people should definitely get another job, maybe in a factory where they don‚Äôt have to interact with people?

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text:
Super lekker food! Friendly people and actually fast. Good bread and good sandwiches. We got there with our 2 kids of 15 days and 2 years old and felt really good. That was a lunch time on a Sunday.
Thanks for your hospitality.

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: This ships gets and sells  a selection from the best breads and pastry made by other craftspeople in town: including very good French croissants and sour bread. Very convenient. And the Portuguese Orange Cake is just to die for...

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Wonderful ham and cheese croissants. Ask to warm it up a bit!

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: great bread and pastries, very good croissants and also a variety of sandwiches. awesome staff.

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Way over priced and the cappuccino is 80 % foam. not too mention it takes them 5 minutes to serve one customer smfh

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Nice baker, with good bread and some delicious sweets.

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Good coffee and good variety of breads, sandwiches and sweet pastries. Staff is very nice and friendly

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Food smells amazing. Friendly staff, upbeat and singing. Wonderful coffee, must stop!!!

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Best bakery in the area. My son loves to have a croissant and joke with the "funny baker"

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Best breakfast and lovely service would definilty recommend the place before heading out to the more busy and expensive centre

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
Review Text: Fine products. Straightforward 'Amsterdamse' service. Outstanding coffee.

Name: Bakkerswinkel Neeltje
